page.title: 12LEISURE
page.content:
The Senior Citizens Club has been running for 30 years now.It is held in the local village hall,once a fortnight on a Tuesday afternoon.On average 25 members attend each meeting.They take part in various activities such as playing Bingo,cards and Dominoes.They also go on outings to seaside resorts.Occasionaly visiting speakers give talks to the senior citizens.
The Dog Training Club commenced about 11 years ago.It is held in the village hall once a week on a Thursday evening.Basically,it is an obedience training class for pet dogs.The aim is to show owners how to handle their dog and to reach a better understanding between dog and owner.
